short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with people watching from different webpages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In this beta release, our plugin connects users watching the same live football games from different webpages to a shared chatroom.

Choose "Theatre mode" to watch the chat alongside your preferred stream, or "Popup mode" for a more casual experience. Either way, engage in real-time discussions, share your reactions, and connect with other sports fans from everywhere.

Available on Google Chrome only for now.
